text: Ara amalanama samane rakha habe. Tate ya ache; tara karane apani aparadhiderake bhita-santrasta dekhabena. Tara balabeh haya aphasosa, e kemana amalanama. E ye chota bara kona kichu'i bada deyani-saba'i ete rayeche. Tara tadera krtakarmake samane upasthita pabe. Apanara palanakarta kara'o prati juluma karabena na.
